ThingDef.Name: RB_TemperateBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
Temperate bees are the most common type of bee, descended from Earth's Apis Mellifera, the European Honey Bee. They produce honey, buzz around, and are quite nice little critters.

Bee Traits:

Production time: 24 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants needed: No
Minimum Temperature: 0ºC
Maximum temperature: 30ºC

ThingDef.Name: RB_MildBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
Mild bees are bees adapted to average temperatures and mild climates, and they produce little honey. They are probably the remnants of ancient genetic manipulation of common bees, but their special traits have been diluted by time. Perhaps if they were crossbred with common bees...

Bee Traits:

Production time: 23 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants needed: No
Minimum Temperature: 0ºC
Maximum temperature: 30ºC

ThingDef.Name: RB_HybridBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
Hybrid bees have mixed traits of temperate and mild bees, and are the first step in the creation of specialized bees for the colony. They are still not very special, but if they are crossbred even further their hidden potential might be awakened.

Bee Traits:

Production time: 24 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants needed: No
Minimum Temperature: 0ºC
Maximum temperature: 30ºC

ThingDef.Name: RB_AmalgamBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
Amalgam bees are improved hybrids, and all specialized bees branch from them. They work a bit faster than basic bees.

Bee Traits:

Production time: 18 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants needed: No
Minimum Temperature: 0ºC
Maximum temperature: 30ºC

ThingDef.Name: RB_AlloyBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
Alloy bees are capable of producing honeycombs with metallic compounds in them. Their honey production is minimal, though. The basic Alloy Bee produces steel plated honeycombs, but it can be crossbred to get more specialized bees. Note that this bee needs a stockpile with some steel nearby to be able to do its job!

Bee Traits:

Production time: 24 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants or resource needed: Steel
Minimum Temperature: 0ºC
Maximum temperature: 30ºC

ThingDef.Name: RB_AdaptiveBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
Adaptive bees are not much affected by the conditions of the biome they are working in. as such, they can stand low and high temperatures a bit better, and they work very fast. You'll need to keep crossbreeding them to get truly specialized bees, though!

Bee Traits:

Production time: 12 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants or resource needed: no
Minimum Temperature: -5ºC
Maximum temperature: 40ºC

ThingDef.Name: RB_NeutroBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
Neutro bees capture residual chemical compounds from nearby locations and store them in their honeycombs, producing Neutroamine. Note that this bee needs a stockpile with some neutroamine nearby to be able to do its job! 

Bee Traits:

Production time: 24 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants or resource needed: Neutroamine
Minimum Temperature: 0ºC
Maximum temperature: 30ºC

ThingDef.Name: RB_NutritiousBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
Nutritious bees produce fleshy honeycombs that drip blood. This is just disgusting... However, they can be crossbred further into a multitude of specialized bees producing all kinds of edible food.

Bee Traits:

Production time: 24 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants or resource needed: No
Minimum Temperature: 0ºC
Maximum temperature: 30ºC

ThingDef.Name: RB_TechnologicalBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
Technological bees are part bee, part machine. They can be further crossbred into bees that provide chemfuel, components, and other technological marvels. But more importantly, they produce Bio Interface Components, which are used to build advanced beehouses.

Bee Traits:

Production time: 48 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants or resource needed: No
Minimum Temperature: 0ºC
Maximum temperature: 30ºC

ThingDef.Name: RB_ArcticBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
Arctic bees can survive in the coldest climates of the Rim without any kind of artificial heat source. If you use them in a beehouse with a different breed of bee, they will lower the minimun temparature they can work in.

Bee Traits:

Production time: 24 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants or resource needed: No
Minimum Temperature: -100ºC
Maximum temperature: 0ºC

ThingDef.Name: RB_WoodlandBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
Woodland bees feel happily at home surrounded by lots of trees.

Bee Traits:

Production time: 24 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: Yes
Unusual plants or resource needed: No
Minimum Temperature: 0ºC
Maximum temperature: 30ºC

ThingDef.Name: RB_DesertBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
Desert bees grow in extremely dry and hot biomes. They need almost no water to survive, but they produce very little honey as a result. If you use them in a beehouse with a different breed of bee, they will raise the maximun temparature they can work in.

Bee Traits:

Production time: 24 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants or resource needed: No
Minimum Temperature: 30ºC
Maximum temperature: 100ºC

ThingDef.Name: RB_SwampBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
Swamp bees have evolved in high humidity environments and planets. They collect strange organic compounds extracted from the exotic flora of the tropical rainforests and bogs they live in, giving their honey and wax a pungent chemical smell. If you use them in a beehouse with a different breed of bee, they will allow your bees to work during the rain.

Bee Traits:

Production time: 24 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: Yes
Unusual plants or resource needed: No
Minimum Temperature: 10ºC
Maximum temperature: 55ºC

ThingDef.Name: RB_NocturnalBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
Nocturnal bees have adapted to darkness, and they don't need to decrease their activity during the night like other breeds do. If you use them in a beehouse with a different breed of bee, they will allow your bees to work during the night.

Bee Traits:

Production time: 24 hours
Nocturnal: Yes
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants or resource needed: No
Minimum Temperature: -10ºC
Maximum temperature: 25ºC

ThingDef.Name: RB_ArgentBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
Argent bees are capable of producing honeycombs with silver compounds in them. Their honey production is minimal, though. Note that this bee needs a stockpile with some silver nearby to be able to do its job!

Bee Traits:

Production time: 24 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants or resource needed: Silver
Minimum Temperature: 0ºC
Maximum temperature: 30ºC

ThingDef.Name: RB_AurumBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
Aurum bees are capable of producing honeycombs with gold compounds in them. Their honey production is minimal, though. Note that this bee needs a stockpile with some gold nearby to be able to do its job!

Bee Traits:

Production time: 24 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants or resource needed: Gold
Minimum Temperature: 0ºC
Maximum temperature: 30ºC

ThingDef.Name: RB_PreciousBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
Precious bees are capable of producing honeycombs with jade compounds in them. Their honey production is minimal, though. Note that this bee needs a stockpile with some jade nearby to be able to do its job!

Bee Traits:

Production time: 24 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants or resource needed: Jade
Minimum Temperature: 0ºC
Maximum temperature: 30ºC

ThingDef.Name: RB_RadioactiveBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
Radioactive bees are capable of producing honeycombs with uranium compounds in them. Their honey production is minimal, though. Note that this bee needs a stockpile with some uranium nearby to be able to do its job!

Bee Traits:

Production time: 24 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants or resource needed: Uranium
Minimum Temperature: 0ºC
Maximum temperature: 30ºC

ThingDef.Name: RB_TipsyBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
Tipsy bees are permanently drunk, moving around in erratic trajectories and causing a problem in any bar they enter. They produce combs saturated with wort, which can then be fermented into beer. These bees will need a grow zone with at least one hops plant growing nearby to do their job.

Bee Traits:

Production time: 24 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: Yes
Unusual plants or resource needed: Hops plant
Minimum Temperature: 0ºC
Maximum temperature: 30ºC

ThingDef.Name: RB_LuxuriousBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
Luxurious bees are able to concentrate pollen in an amazing way, turning it into ambrosia, a very mild drug that is widely used on the Rim.

Bee Traits:

Production time: 72 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants or resource needed: No
Minimum Temperature: 0ºC
Maximum temperature: 30ºC

ThingDef.Name: RB_PsychicBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
Psychic bees know everything and see everything. Not because they are wise ancient seers, but because their tiny bodies are saturated with psychite compounds. These bees will need a grow zone with at least one psychoid growing nearby to do their job.

Bee Traits:

Production time: 24 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants or resource needed: Psychoid Plant
Minimum Temperature: 0ºC
Maximum temperature: 30ºC

ThingDef.Name: RB_StonerBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
Man... like... have you seen the Rim? It's like... totaly fucked up, man... Like, Woaaa... pass that joint. These bees will need a grow zone with at least one smokeleaf growing nearby to do their job.

Bee Traits:

Production time: 24 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants or resource needed: Smokeleaf Plant
Minimum Temperature: 0ºC
Maximum temperature: 30ºC

ThingDef.Name: RB_AgriculturalBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
Agricultural bees are hard workers, extracting grain from their environment and stuffing their honeycombs full of strange undiferentiated seeds. These bees will need a grow zone with at least one corn plant growing nearby to do their job.

Bee Traits:

Production time: 16 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: Yes
Unusual plants or resource needed: Corn plant
Minimum Temperature: 5ºC
Maximum temperature: 25ºC

ThingDef.Name: RB_BittersweetBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
Bittersweet bees like chocolate. I mean, who doesn't? Monsters, that's who. But Bittersweet bees *really* love it, and they like to stuff their combs with it.

Bee Traits:

Production time: 32 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants or resource needed: No
Minimum Temperature: 0ºC
Maximum temperature: 30ºC

ThingDef.Name: RB_LacticBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
Lactic bees are part mammal, part insect. As such, they use milk instead of royal honey to feed their larvae, which is simultaneously cute and disgusting.

Bee Traits:

Production time: 24 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants or resource needed: No
Minimum Temperature: 0ºC
Maximum temperature: 30ºC

ThingDef.Name: RB_EgglayingBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
Egglaying bees are part chicken, part insect. As such, instead of growing their larvae in the receptacles inside honeycombs, they lay tiny chicken eggs, and larvae hatch from them.

Bee Traits:

Production time: 24 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants or resource needed: No
Minimum Temperature: 0ºC
Maximum temperature: 30ºC

ThingDef.Name: RB_InsectoidBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
Insectoid bees are part insect... Wait... But all bees are... Nevermind, these bees produce insect jelly just like the insectoids that insist on being a nuisance to your colony.

Bee Traits:

Production time: 36 hours
Nocturnal: Yes
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants or resource needed: No
Minimum Temperature: -10ºC
Maximum temperature: 35ºC

ThingDef.Name: RB_ElectronicBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
Electronic bees are part machine, fitted with bio-mechanical gears to effortlessly glide through the air. They are adept at extracting small amounts of copper from their surroundings and creating industrial components inside their honeycombs.

Bee Traits:

Production time: 72 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants or resource needed: No
Minimum Temperature: -10ºC
Maximum temperature: 45ºC

ThingDef.Name: RB_OilyBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
Oily bees are coated in a thich layer of fuel, which they produce constantly. Their combs are also saturated with fuel, which can be easily canned and used as Chemfuel. They'll need a stockpile with a little bit of Chemfuel nearby to start refining its compounds, though.

Bee Traits:

Production time: 48 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants or resource needed: Chemfuel
Minimum Temperature: 0ºC
Maximum temperature: 30ºC

ThingDef.Name: RB_PlasticBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
Plastic bees can extract minute plasteel molecules from nearby and weave them into bio-metallic lattices inside their combs, thus replicating more plasteel. They'll need a stockpile with a little bit of Plasteel nearby to start weaving, though.

Bee Traits:

Production time: 24 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants or resource needed: Plasteel
Minimum Temperature: 0ºC
Maximum temperature: 30ºC

ThingDef.Name: RB_WeavingBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
Weaving bees are all about knitting, crocheting and felting. It's all they care to do in their spare time.

Bee Traits:

Production time: 24 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants or resource needed: No
Minimum Temperature: 0ºC
Maximum temperature: 30ºC

ThingDef.Name: RB_TannerBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
Tanner bees are capable of creating a pseudo-artificial leather without needing to kill any animals. Vegans will be super pleased! Well, except for the whole enslaving entire colonies of bees, that is...

Bee Traits:

Production time: 30 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants or resource needed: No
Minimum Temperature: -10ºC
Maximum temperature: 30ºC

ThingDef.Name: RB_WoolyBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
Wooly bees are miniature insects covered in a dense fur. Which is not the source of any nightmares at all, no sir!

Bee Traits:

Production time: 40 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants or resource needed: No
Minimum Temperature: -20ºC
Maximum temperature: 30ºC

ThingDef.Name: RB_StrawBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
Straw bees slowly collect loose dry grass lying around and weave it into their honeycombs. These strands can then be extracted from the comb and turned into useable Hay.

Bee Traits:

Production time: 24 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants or resource needed: No
Minimum Temperature: 0ºC
Maximum temperature: 35ºC

ThingDef.Name: RB_PetBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
Pet bees really care about all other animals, and they'd like you to have a LOT of pets running around the colony.

Bee Traits:

Production time: 24 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants or resource needed: No
Minimum Temperature: 0ºC
Maximum temperature: 35ºC

ThingDef.Name: RB_HighBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
High bees are junkies, permanently high on yayo. This makes them pretty terrible workers, but they produce a significant, constant amount of drugs, which accumulates on their combs.

Bee Traits:

Production time: 72 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants or resource needed: No
Minimum Temperature: 0ºC
Maximum temperature: 40ºC

ThingDef.Name: RB_LuciferBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
I hope you are proud of yourself. An entire breed of bees addicted to luciferium. Lucifer bees are the slowest working bees possible, what with the constant dying and suffering but they produce a significant, constant amount of luciferium, which accumulates on their combs.

Bee Traits:

Production time: 240 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants or resource needed: No
Minimum Temperature: 0ºC
Maximum temperature: 40ºC

ThingDef.Name: RB_CulinaryBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
Culinary bees like to cook. They are not very good at it, but the poor critters try to do their best. Their combs have a nutrient paste that can be processed into a very simple meal. Not appetizing, but edible.

Bee Traits:

Production time: 24 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants or resource needed: No
Minimum Temperature: 0ºC
Maximum temperature: 30ºC

ThingDef.Name: RB_ChefBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
Chef bees REALLY do like to cook! And they are surprisingly good at it, too! They accumulate different ingredients on their combs, and those can be easily turned into a meal of decent quality.

Bee Traits:

Production time: 24 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants or resource needed: No
Minimum Temperature: 0ºC
Maximum temperature: 30ºC

ThingDef.Name: RB_MedicinalBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
Medicinal bees secrete a saline solution that can be used as a low grade medicinal salve.

Bee Traits:

Production time: 48 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants or resource needed: No
Minimum Temperature: 0ºC
Maximum temperature: 30ºC

ThingDef.Name: RB_SurgeonBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
Surgeon bees secrete a more powerful version of the saline solution produced by medicinal bees, but they also had to study more years at University.

Bee Traits:

Production time: 125 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants or resource needed: No
Minimum Temperature: 0ºC
Maximum temperature: 30ºC

ThingDef.Name: RB_SyntheticBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
Synthetic bees catch minute fibres from the air surrounding them and weave them with a natural silk to create synthread, which they spun in their combs, ready to be harvested. They will need some plasteel nearby, though!

Bee Traits:

Production time: 24 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants or resource needed: Plasteel
Minimum Temperature: 0ºC
Maximum temperature: 30ºC

ThingDef.Name: RB_HyperBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
Hyper bees catch minute fibres from the air surrounding them and weave them with a natural silk to create hyperthread, which they spun in their combs, ready to be harvested. They will need some plasteel nearby, though!

Bee Traits:

Production time: 24 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants or resource needed: Plasteel
Minimum Temperature: 0ºC
Maximum temperature: 30ºC

ThingDef.Name: RB_NitroBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
These bees synthesize a very unstable compound that can be extracted to create explosive mortar shells. They work very slow, though, and they'll need a stockpile with a little bit of Chemfuel nearby to start refining its compounds.

Bee Traits:

Production time: 120 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants or resource needed: Chemfuel
Minimum Temperature: 0ºC
Maximum temperature: 40ºC

ThingDef.Name: RB_FabricatedBeeBase
ThingDef.description:
Fabricated bees synthesize technology and refine it into a more advanced form. They'll need a stockpile with Components nearby and they'll slowly incorporate them into their honeycombs as Advanced Components.

Bee Traits:

Production time: 120 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants or resource needed: Components
Minimum Temperature: 0ºC
Maximum temperature: 40ºC
